Atlas Tour · From Core → X-Domain
The Φ-Cosmography Atlas organizes the Solar System into a fractal, golden-ratio hierarchy:

• Inner φ-Core — Sun-centred spatial grid and reference geometry.
• φ-Floors — Jupiter → Saturn → Uranus → Neptune layered architecture.
• Helion φ⁵ — bridge between giant-planet domain and deep-space corridors.
• X-Domain — φ-aligned search region for detached and long-period candidates.
